price: Ẹ rántí nígbà tí A gba àdéhùn yín, A sì gbé àpáta wá sókè orí yín, (A sì sọ pé): “Ẹ gbá ohun tí A fún yín mú dáradára, kí ẹ sì rántí ohun tó wà nínú rẹ̀, nítorí kí ẹ lè bẹ̀rù (Allāhu).
arabic: وَإِذۡ أَخَذۡنَا مِيثَٰقَكُمۡ وَرَفَعۡنَا فَوۡقَكُمُ ٱلطُّورَ خُذُواْ مَآ ءَاتَيۡنَٰكُم بِقُوَّةٖ وَٱذۡكُرُواْ مَا فِيهِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh akhadhnā mīthāqakum warafaʿnā fawqakumu al-ṭūra khudhū mā ātaynākum biquwwatin wa-udh'kurū mā fīhi laʿallakum tattaqūna
